video.title: Developing for the rest of the world
video.description:
Many businesses are looking for growth outside the United States and Europe. To capture these new markets dedicated engineering effort will be required. This talk will provide tips for developing apps intended for an international audience.

Talk by Eric Frohnhoefer.

Video recorded at the GDG DevFest Ukraine - the biggest conference about Google technologies in Central and Eastern Europe.
Learn about the conference at https://devfest.gdg.org.ua/
More recordings at http://bit.ly/devfestua-channel

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.org
